mapper.insert: insert into answermodifyreply(articleNo, contents, uid, regiTime) values (#{articleNo}, #{contents}, #{uid}, now())
mapper.select: select replyNo, contents, nickname, regiTime from answermodifyreply amr join userinfo ui on amr.uid = ui.uid where articleNo = #{articleNo} order by regiTime desc
mapper.delete: delete from answermodifyreply where articleNo = #{articleNo} and replyNo = #{replyNo}
